items.sentence: Tom has already given me what I really wanted.
Tom saw Mary eating a sandwich under the tree.
The three of us ate hot dogs and potato salad.
Tom took a long drink from the glass of water.
Tom wants to help, but isn't exactly sure how.
Tom has been helping me get ready for my trip.
Tom can help you find what you're looking for.
Maybe you can help me find out where Tom went.
I'm just not so sure we should be helping Tom.
Tom's bank account has been frozen by the IRS.
This is the corner where Tom got hit by a car.
Is there some reason why Tom isn't here today?
The bottle Tom was holding had a purple label.
I don't remember if Tom's car was blue or not.
Tom had nothing to do with what happened here.
When will Tom be discharged from the hospital?
It's rumored that Tom and Mary have broken up.
Tom says that he can prove that Mary did that.
Tom said he expects his kids to be successful.
Tom told Mary that he thought John wasn't mad.
Tom said his parents let him do what he wants.
My room is number fourteen on the third floor.
My mother looked at me with tears in her eyes.
My great-grandfather was the leader of a gang.
If I were you, I wouldn't pitch my tent there.
If I were you, I wouldn't tell Tom about that.
Do you have anything planned for this evening?
I bought a laser pointer for the presentation.
I want to learn as many languages as possible.
Both of the entrances to the room are guarded.
That's not the response that I was hoping for.
I'm sorry I forgot to show Tom how to do that.
I'm not much better at doing that than Tom is.
I wonder if Tom is still reluctant to do that.
I wonder if Tom is still desperate to do that.
I won't be able to do that without Tom's help.
I wasn't the one who convinced Tom to do that.
I thought Tom was wasting his time doing that.
I thought Tom said he wasn't ready to do that.
I think you should let Tom do that by himself.
I think that Tom should be the one to do that.
I think Tom would like you to do that for him.
I think Tom would do that if you asked him to.
I think Tom is still interested in doing that.
I think I can get Tom to do that if you can't.
I know Tom will be able to do that eventually.
I don't want to do that the way Tom suggested.
I don't think Tom has the strength to do that.
I don't think Tom has the patience to do that.
I don't think Tom can do that without my help.
